name: Indo Traffic - Tuk Tuk Transport
description:
Let’s play Indo Traffic - Tuk Tuk Transport simulator game with experience in taking and dropping passengers from one stop to another stop. The game is about to go out and taxi the people to their destination. Drive like public transport and provide best services to the passengers by dropping them on their destination within time limit.
Game Features:
• A complete big city Environment to Explore
• Pick and Drop passengers to their Destinations
• Hours of Driving Fun with Rickshaw Driver Duty
• City Auto Rickshaw driving experience
